com.artemis.managers

Class PlayerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.BaseSystem
      • com.artemis.Manager
        • com.artemis.managers.PlayerManager

  • public class PlayerManager
extends Manager
    You may sometimes want to specify to which player an entity belongs to.

    An entity can only belong to a single player at a time.

    Author:
    Arni Arent

    • Method Detail

      • setPlayer

        public void setPlayer(Entity e,
             String player)
        Associate the entity with the specified player.

        Each entity may only be assoctiated with one player at a time.

        Parameters:
        e - the entity to associate
        player - the player to associtate to the entity with

        Parameters:

        Returns:
